text:
@SenSanders Wish we could get these tweets right the 1st time.
"As coronavirus ravages our communities and millions go jobless, Senate Republicans" - AND DEMOCRATS - "want to spend $740 billion on bombs and missiles". Those of us paying attention see the votes.
